message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm confident it will bring significant value to your business. My asking price is $1,000,000.  Let's discuss this further.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $975,000? This would allow both of us to walk away feeling good about the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit below your last offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $950,000 and $975,000, so I'm offering $962,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
